name: INHERITANCE (ProP)
description:
The NutriSnack dispenser has been quiet for a long time. You are hungry. You are going to be brave, and you are going to find a way out of your room, and you are going to do it--to go Outside.

(INHERITANCE is a short, experimental limited parser game. Release builds are available for download for Windows and OSX.)

NOTE: INHERITANCE was written as a way for me to experiment with building a limited parser game from the ground up with audio/visual components. While I have no immediate plans to keep on the game, the following are known (minor) issues:

-Missing sprites for flashlight and knife

...That said, any bug reports are welcome.
